# n = 8  # number of Ising variables
# 11 T = 180 # number of epoc for theta
# 12 N = 300000 # number of smples, comes form true Prob
# 13 N_est = 100 # number of smples, comes form estimated Prob
# 14 ypc = 1 # descent ratio
# 15 cord = 0 # changiable spin variable when gibbus sampling time step
# 16 beta = 0.01
